mean_cn: adj. 厌恶人类的，不愿与人来往的
mean_en: believing the worst of human nature and motives; having a sneering disbelief in e.g. selflessness of others
word_etyma: mis恨+anthrop人+ic…的 →厌恶人类的，厌世的
sentence: He was a misanthropic mass of hatred just looking for someone to punch.
sentence_trans: 他是一个充满仇恨的厌世者，只想找人来揍。
